colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,SPYIR KLU GTOR NI THEBS YOD MED LA LTOS NA DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I PHYAG LEN GYI DKAR CHA BZHI PA'I NANG GI KLU GTOR RGYUN DU MDZAD CING PHAN YON CHE NAS, 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHE DANG RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED BZANG PO DPAL SOGS GONG MA RNAMS KYI YIG CHA NAS, RJE SHAR BA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I YI GE LAS PHYUD STE RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING PA'I RGYUN KHYER DU ZA HOR GYI BANDES BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BAN 'JAM DBYANGS SO,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,
